attributes.action: Freeze tax for the key workers that has worked  through the lockdown period. .
attributes.additional_details:
I as a gas engineer have been constantly working on average 8 properties a day 5 days a week putting myself and my family at risk of possible serious illness while going into furloughed homes.  
There has been a lot of recognition of this from a lot of people who sympathies that we have to put ourselves and families in this situation.  
My wife is also pregnant and furloughed at home. We have been using PPE but we don’t know who or where this virus is..  it has been a very stressful time. .
attributes.background: key workers from Mar 24--May 31. Those close also have been at risk while not eligible for furlough or any incentive from government to keep working, therefore should not be penalised for working in such times. I would like the government to exempt workers from  recovery prog due to tax increase,

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312359
